com.jcodeing.kmedia.video

Class PlayerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.jcodeing.kmedia.video.APlayerView<PlayerView>
            • com.jcodeing.kmedia.video.PlayerView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public final class PlayerView
extends APlayerView<PlayerView>
    Player View. below simple use for layout. 
     Attrs
 ==========================================
 app:surface_type="surface_view"|"texture_view"|...
 app:resize_mode="fill"|"fit"|"fixed_width/height"
 app:use_control_group="true"
 app:use_gesture_detector="false"
 app:player_layout_id="..."
 app:...

 Simple template
 ==========================================
 Default
 ------------------------------------------
 <com.jcodeing.kmedia.video.PlayerView
   android:id="@id/k_player_view"
   android:layout_width="match_parent"
   android:layout_height="200dp"/>

 Custom ControlLayer
 ------------------------------------------
 <com.jcodeing.kmedia.video.PlayerView
   android:id="@id/k_player_view"
   android:layout_width="match_parent"
   android:layout_height="200dp">
   <com.jcodeing.kmedia.video.ControlLayerView
     android:id="@id/k_ctrl_layer_port"
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="match_parent"/>
  <com.jcodeing.kmedia.video.PlayerView/>

 Custom Control Group
 ------------------------------------------
 <com.jcodeing.kmedia.video.PlayerView
   android:id="@id/k_player_view"
   android:layout_width="match_parent"
   android:layout_height="200dp">
   <com.jcodeing.kmedia.video.ControlGroupView
     android:id="@id/k_ctrl_group"
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="match_parent">
     <com.jcodeing.kmedia.video.ControlLayerView
       android:id="@id/k_ctrl_layer_port"
       android:layout_width="match_parent"
       android:layout_height="match_parent"/>
     <com.jcodeing.kmedia.video.ControlLayerView
       android:id="@id/k_ctrl_layer_land"
       android:layout_width="match_parent"
       android:layout_height="match_parent"/>
   <com.jcodeing.kmedia.video.ControlGroupView/>
 <com.jcodeing.kmedia.video.PlayerView/>

 Readme
 ==========================================
 View frame explain:
 |-------------------------------------|
 |                                     |
 |                                     |
 |      Surface/Texture                |
 |        AspectRatioView              |
 |          ControlGroupView           |
 |            ControlLayerView         |
 |              Custom(Shutter..)      |
 |                                     |
 |                                     |
 |-------------------------------------|
    See Also:
    R.layout#k_player_view, ControlGroupView, ControlLayerView, AspectRatioView

        Gets the view onto which video is rendered. This is either a SurfaceView (default) or a TextureView if the use_texture_view view attribute has been set to true.
        Returns:
        Either a SurfaceView or a TextureView.

      • setSurfaceView

        public void setSurfaceView(android.view.View surfaceView)
        Set a new surface view
